solution_line_template: Three times Joe's bid is {multiplier_thrice} * {joe_bid} = <<{multiplier_thrice}*{joe_bid}={thrice_joe_bid}>>{thrice_joe_bid} dollars
Since Nelly paid an additional ${additional_payment}, she paid {additional_payment} + {thrice_joe_bid} = <<{additional_payment}+{thrice_joe_bid}={nelly_payment}>>{nelly_payment} dollars.
